import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import logoImg from '../assets/logo.avif'; import './About.css'; const About: React.FC = () => { const values = [ { icon: ❤️, title: 'Passion for Dance', description: 'We believe in the transformative power of bachata to bring people together and create lasting connections.' }, { icon: 👥, title: 'Community First', description: 'Building a global community of dancers who support, inspire, and learn from each other.' }, { icon: 🌎, title: 'Cultural Exchange', description: 'Celebrating the rich diversity of Latin culture while embracing the beauty of Middle Eastern traditions.' }, { icon: 🏆, title: 'Excellence', description: 'Committed to providing world-class experiences with the best artists, venues, and organization.' } ]; const team = [ { name: 'Festival Director', role: 'Event Management', description: 'Leading the vision and execution of the Latin Notion Bachata Festival.' }, { name: 'Artistic Director', role: 'Artist Relations', description: 'Curating world-class artists and ensuring exceptional workshop experiences.' }, { name: 'Community Manager', role: 'Participant Experience', description: 'Creating memorable experiences and fostering connections among festival attendees.' } ]; return (
{/* Full-bleed hero with image background and overlapping logo/text */}

About Latin Notion

Bringing the world's best bachata artists to Dubai for an unforgettable festival experience

{/* Story Section */}

Our Story

Latin Notion was born from a passion for bachata and a vision to create a world-class festival experience in the heart of Dubai. What started as a small gathering of dance enthusiasts has evolved into one of the most anticipated bachata festivals in the region.

Our 3rd edition represents years of dedication to bringing together the best international artists, creating immersive learning experiences, and fostering a global community of bachata lovers. We believe in the power of dance to transcend cultural boundaries and create lasting connections.

From our humble beginnings to becoming a premier destination for bachata enthusiasts worldwide, Latin Notion continues to push the boundaries of what a dance festival can be.

📅

3rd Edition

Years of Excellence

👥

500+

20+

Countries Represented

Dubai

Iconic Location

 {/* Values Section */}

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do at Latin Notion

{values.map((value, index) => (
{value.icon}

{value.title}

{value.description}

))}
); }; export default About;
